rule: If the word cannot be tagged with any of the listed part-of-speech tags, the output must be exactly the word "Unknown" without any additional characters or information.
input: I want to learn all languages. want
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is "VB", which is returned as a part of speech tag. According to the provided description, the chatbot is expected to return a part of speech tag based on the sentence and word input it receives. Since "VB" is a part of speech tag listed in the descriptions for Verb, base form, the chatbot's output complies with the requirements of returning just a part of speech tag.

No violations are detected in this compliance check as it does not require the input to determine the correctness of the tag.

OK
